section.name: Overview
section.p: The Jaulp project is a utility library with many functionalities. Here are a few of them:

ul.li: Many Date utilities for computing Ages, converting Dates to Timestamp and other useful thinks.
Helper classes for send email with attachments.
Many File utilities for handling input and output.
Input and Output utilities for serialized object and resources.
Helper classes for layouting window components.
Helper classes for generate random data.
Helper classes for the GUI Swing library.

section.name: Documentation
section.p: The Javadoc API documents are available online:
